headline: Chevron’s president explains how the company transformed the historically boom-and-bust shale business into a steadily profitable enterprise
summary: Chevron slows down in the booming Permian as it looks to international growth.

headline: Meta is sinking $10 billion into rural Louisiana to build the home of its wildest AI aspirations, setting the template for the nation’s grid buildout
summary: The massive data center buildout is underway, requiring massive amounts of new power and, increasingly, more fossil fuels and gas plants.

headline: Is Plug Power Stock a Millionaire Maker?
summary: The company has spent years laying the groundwork to capitalize on what could be a $300 billion or more global market by 2030.
